TextView.android:text: Welcome to LotsOfSpots! This app is intended to allow drivers to utilize certain parking lots where there spot is reserved in an online database where people can see the availability of parking lots for easier and less stressful parking. Register your car in the app using its license plate and registration number so that no one else to try and register it for their account. When you use of the select parking lots, you must log in to the app, select your lot and car, and check-in so the database can updates its information. When you must leave, you must do the same or the numbers online will be inaccurate. Any inaccuate numbers can be reported to a moderator on the home page under 'Contact Moderator'.\nFor more information, visit: https://github.com/bsteuerman832/LotsOfSpots/wiki
